description:
With a few words from the grandmaster, Morina finds herself working at Sairei. She finds herself overwhelmed by Sairei’s solidly formal aura, and in awe of the beauty in traditional Japanese food. As Morina soaks in the refined scents and aura that only Sairei can provide, she also picks up familiar scents of old nearby.
Morina! At this rate, will you stay at Sairei?
Source: crunchyroll
